primary.context: Customer wanted to make a payment but could not be verified by the AI.
primary.detail: The AI could not locate the account via phone number and the user declined to provide a contract ID, leading to a concierge transfer.

steps: Customer requested to pay a bill.
Agent asked to clarify if it was for maintenance or mortgage.
Agent attempted account lookup via phone number.
Lookup failed; agent asked for contract ID.
Customer refused to provide contract ID.
Agent transferred the call to the concierge department.

clarifications.note: Phone number lookup returned no results.

actions.detail: Phone number 2099150912 not found in records.
Transferred to concierge after verification failure.

insights.summary: The customer called to pay a bill but the AI could not find their account using the provided phone number. When the customer declined to provide a contract ID, the AI correctly transferred them to the concierge queue.
insights.verbatim: I could not find your record using your phone number. Would you be able to provide your contract ID instead?
